flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday and Tuesday Bart finished 3 + 4 = <<3+4=7>>7 surveys.
Each survey has 10 questions, so he answered 10 * 7 = <<10*7=70>>70 questions.
Bart gets paid $0.2 for each questions, so he earned 70 * $0.2 = $<<70*0.2=41>>41.
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
